channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 05:11 Dumping anxiety in the Poltava region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 05:11 Dumping anxiety in the Poltava region.Creck on further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 04:50 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 04:50 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
